clinical_study.brief_title: Donafenib Monotherapy for Previously Treated Metastatic Gastric Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1B Study of Donafenib Monotherapy for Previously Treated Metastatic Gastric Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: This open-label, one-center, noncomparative, two-stage phase 1B trial assessed the donafenib in advanced gastric cancer.

detailed_description.textblock: This open-label, one-center, noncomparative, two-stage phase 1B trial assessed the tyrosine kinase inhibitor donafenib tosilate tablets (400 mg/d,200mg bid) in patients with advanced, inoperable gastric cancer progressing after chemotherapy . The primary endpoint is the safety.The secondary endpoints are tumor response and progression-free survival time.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants with Adverse Events
